website_summaries.verdict: Never again will you have to suffer through "iPhone Storage Full" messages. The Bolt is the fastest, easiest way to back up photos and videos.
pros: the required app installs automatically when you plug the Bolt into iPhone or iPad
Protective rubber case is an appreciated touch
Easy to store extra photos and videos
You can even leave it plugged into the phone if you know you'll be taking lots of photos in one day
cons: Device is designed for a very specific purpose: only stores photo and video files from iPhone and iPad

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing, it’s a little expensive but it feels really well made and the app works well with my iPhone 8 plus. I got the 32gb size because of the price but I think it would be good for taking pictures at an event because anyone with the app can download the pictures from the drive, so it makes sharing pictures easier
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Actually this Bolt is Silver, not white as listed. Works fine along with its app on my iPhone SE and 6s. I only wish it would allow you to transfer video's and pics from the Bolt (like on a transfer of video from laptop to Bolt) back to my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Siffert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Build Quality. Easy setup. Plug in the Bolt and it will prompt you to install the app if it is not already on your device. Works perfectly fine for transferring files from the iPhone to Bolt. The transfer rate is at 10 mb/s which is not fully utilizing USB 3.0 capability.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and has a really "techy" appearance. It is very simple to use and basically gets everything started for you once you plug it into the phone. The only reason I did give it a four rather than a 5 is that it crashed a couple of times but I did have a about 2,000 pictures transfer at one time. Over all I think it's a great buy that you won't regret.
customer_reviews.author: King Edgar

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! Download the app then start moving your pics. Bought for my husband (who is NOT tech savvy at all!) who had hundreds of photos on his phone that needed to be moved. He loved so much I got one for my son-in-law for Christmas. No negatives at all. Just one FYI. Make sure your Phone is fully charged before you start transferring and note that moving a lot at one time, takes a chunk of time. We do smaller groups at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Vanderford

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a real waste of money. It does not come with any kind of directions but instinctively I attached it to my iPhone. It indicates it is transferring but in fact it is not. I wrote to the company they wrote back and said they would contact me which they have not done. Don't waste your money with this garbage
customer_reviews.author: sb413

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: worked perfectly right out of the package. Unlike a piece of junk Sandisk.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This item I purchased with the understanding it would help store my pictures off my phone. It failed miserably....unfortunately I didn’t use it right away so I couldn’t return it but it wouldn’t even load the pictures.... safe your money and go elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Harris Cataquet

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use but eventually will work
customer_reviews.text: It took us a while to find out that the original product we received was a defect, then after we receive the 2nd one, it works much easier (still not as easy as it should be). I am writing this review so people knows that if you have a hard time to get this to work, chances are, you got a defect. Kingston used to be much more trustworthy but I guess not anymore. Get an exchange and that should stop your frustration.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Eehhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, it works as it should. Customer service sucked. I told them after the first couple of uses, it started making every phone I’ve used it on start getting super hot and run super slow. Comes in handy though. But storage space slowly starts disappearing? But customer service basically told me that none of this was happening and I was full of it. Would be a better review if customer service wasn’t junk.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Works very well to transfer photo's and add picture capacity.
customer_reviews.text: When I got my iPhone 6 several years ago the 16GB memory was fine. But years later and several updates and large apps I'm out of room. This device is great for quickly transfering photos and in a pinch can be used to directly capture photo's and video's.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Mead

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bolt for my own use and was so impressed with it that I bought another one as a Christmas gift. I really like mine and I am still finding neat features in using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This device is way too slow downloading pics.
customer_reviews.text: When used to dowload photos this device is way too slow. The unfortunate reality is my iPhone cannot be plugged into my charger while the bolt is inserted. This is a problem. The bolt uses up the battery and this means it must be supervised to insure the download is stopped before the phone shuts down due to a depleted battery. I want a device that will work while phone is plugged in and charging.
customer_reviews.author: CGYjr

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had some instructions, but I figured it out and downloaded 450 photos and vids to the Bolt and then to my Mac. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: bay driver

customer_reviews.title: This one actually works
customer_reviews.text: I have been through seven different flash drives for my iPhone. This is the only one that does what is advertised. I was beginning to lose hope but Kingston really came through for me. Extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Transfer speeds are a bit slow
customer_reviews.text: App was easy to install. Kingston is a reputable source in the electronics industry. Product was easy to use. Transfer speeds have been a bit slow. Bought it for a trip abroad that will prevent cloud back for extended periods. It does the job, just not as fast as I would like...:)
customer_reviews.author: C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It’s always with me
customer_reviews.text: I like the password protection. And I keep it on my key ring... so it’s with me at all times, not at home. I don’t like that it ONLY works for pictures and videos. I have some important document files I wish I could keep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU HAVE IPHONE YOU HAVE TO GET ONE
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING SAVED MY LIFE. WHEN YOU HAVE TOO MANY PHOTOS ON YOUR IPHONE AND IT CANT CONNECT TO ANY COMPUTER BECAUSE ITS TOO LOADED THIS IS THE THING YOU WANT TO HAVE IN YOUR POCKET.
customer_reviews.author: bar

customer_reviews.title: best one out of 4 i have used for iphone media transfers
customer_reviews.text: ive tried a few products like this from sandisk and wireless china ones you name it, this one is incredible the app doesn't crash, its super fast to transfer large files, and then easy to choose to move, delete, or just copy off. giving you the options to clean out or just move stuff off
customer_reviews.author: SloppyMechanics

customer_reviews.title: Nifty.
customer_reviews.text: Be nice if they came with a strap, these nifty Bolts are perfect for pulling off my ipad. Downloaded the ap. And away you go, catch those pitcures before they are stolen by the cloud never to be gotten back. HATE the cloud.
customer_reviews.author: TOJ

customer_reviews.title: External disk hard drive for photos
customer_reviews.text: I love this item it arrived on time well packed and certainly does the job not complicated at all even beginners can use this item
customer_reviews.author: keith Norris

customer_reviews.title: Works; wish it was a bit faster.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the new Ipad OS broke direct PC-to-Ipad file transfer using USB-Lightning cable. The only flaw is the sluggish transfer speed to the drive from the computer. Otherwise it does what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not transferring information
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the app plugged in to transfer information over and hour has gone and not a file/pic/item has been transferred.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Needed new same Design but different design with light indicator light indicator Catholic and Ch
customer_reviews.text: Don’t understand understand It Device Memory I bought 3. To me the Device is getting hot when I touched it. 5 times. Maybe I return it but I like the design Areas. But not the problem or program they write on the device.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 othe drives and they didn’t work This one is great I don’t even have to take my case off and you just plug it in and get program
customer_reviews.author: M. utech

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: Product did not wor, at all. Not on my phone, not in my iPad. Waste of money. Could not return for refund because their policy called for taking parcel to UPS store to get return label printed. That would have been a 78 mile one-way trip and would have cost more to drive than it was worth. This was a failed purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Hill

customer_reviews.title: ... husband as a gift and he LOVES it (so easy to use)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift and he LOVES it (so easy to use)!
customer_reviews.author: Britain

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use even my wife was able to use it correctly
customer_reviews.text: does all is says it can do, very easy to use, works flawlessly with iPhone 7
customer_reviews.author: steve arredondo

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I almost did not buy this thing because of a few negative reviews. That would have been a huge mistake. It's easy to set up and use. And, has solved my photo storage issue.
customer_reviews.author: STLGUY

customer_reviews.title: It's permanently affixed to my key chain. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: It's permanently affixed to my key chain. I had a couple issues on startup so I called tech support and they were genuinely concerned with my issues. Kudos to them! So much easier than iTunes in saving my iPhone pics with the bonus of being able to save directly to the Bolt and bypassing the phone memory.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: App is faulty
customer_reviews.text: If it worked it would be great. After a few month of use it crashes the app every single time. It’s not usable at this point and too late to return. I’ve deleted and reinstalled the app and it still won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Cobbweb422

customer_reviews.title: works well, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: They have a few "quirks" but in general work ok. It does what it is supposed to, but it could be less circuitous about it.
customer_reviews.author: TBS

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: This may or may not be easy to use. I'll never know. I can't bring up the app that is supposed to open automatically, and without that app, it will do nothing.
customer_reviews.author: P.Nuss

customer_reviews.title: Gives that extra space to ya
customer_reviews.text: Works! Needed space on phone and this did the trick moved all photos to bolt then deleted off phone and boom!!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Storage for pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I am pleased to have all my photos saved. It was disappointing to find that was all it worked for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and love it! so easy to use and so needed. Apple store doesn't carry when I asked. Expensive but holds and transfers all I need. Great Christmas birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great device and really easy to use, only complaint is that you have to download an app in order to use it.
customer_reviews.author: artistgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the iPhone. The native app wants to do pictures, so you its a little tricky migrating documents etc..
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it to do. Pull photo’s from an iPhone, to a Windows laptop folder.
customer_reviews.author: redelta222

customer_reviews.title: Great little flash drive for photo backup
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs of storing photos to free up space on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gipijay

customer_reviews.title: I think I need more instructions on how to use this.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not clear on whether this transferred all pictures from both sources.
customer_reviews.author: tennisusan

customer_reviews.title: You need this is you have a smart phone and computer.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know how much I needed this until I got it. Must have
customer_reviews.author: DJ Tony Tone(BKS)

customer_reviews.title: A must to own
customer_reviews.text: It fits right into my iPhone. Downloading is easy and quickly frees up memory
customer_reviews.author: Aleta j

customer_reviews.title: Perfect , simple & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect & just the kind I needed. Simple & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: Not work very good
customer_reviews.text: This item is small but handy. Looks really good. Very easy to use. But unfortunately it’s for photos and videos only. And I can transfer pictures and videos from iPad to iPhone 8, but not from iPhone to iPod. There must’ve some problems.
customer_reviews.author: hbd91789

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much I bought 4 more of them for family
customer_reviews.author: Mike Goleman

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The app is very user friendly and I was able to download 8 GB of video and pictures in about 10 min. Could it be faster, yes, but in all it is a great product for a secondary backup for your memories.
customer_reviews.author: Scott thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo slowwww
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so slow. Tried it wit 5 photos to download and it took over 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to the cloud
customer_reviews.text: Great option to the cloud and it will work anywhere without an internet connection!
customer_reviews.author: BoatDoc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked from the day I received it. I followed the directions exactly and after multiple multiple attempts to download my pictures it never worked, it just kept thinking and thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive doesn’t work. I have tried it on different phones and I can’t get it to work. Can you give me my money back or a flash drive that works with an IPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Cool idea but sits at preparing transfer of 3gb for half a day with no files transferred.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kurita

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and time saving , worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was quick and efficient, I honestly don't use my PC to backup my phone anymore o ly my Bolt drive
customer_reviews.author: PharaohOmar

customer_reviews.title: App works. Hardware does not.
customer_reviews.text: Used item once and it stopped functioning. There is ONE picture on it because as soon as I tried capturing video it failed permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J. Homer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised & very easy to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it made transferring photos from his phone much easier
customer_reviews.author: B. Teschner

customer_reviews.title: Easy Bolt
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking pictures off your phone easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright, honestly it doesn’t save a lot of pics cause of the app I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Gino Silva

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: The Bolt is not doing what it's supposed to do. Totally non-responsive!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Jennings

customer_reviews.title: does what it suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Like it . Gave me more storage to take more photos on my phone
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to download pictures from iPhone and easy access for viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality built design that is worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.text: A must for anyone that wants to by pass dealing with the cloud and all that bull.
customer_reviews.author: David Currie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job. Only problem is it comes up as a disk not a USB
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Voeltz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for photo storage
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, quick shipping from the US to the UK and fantastic item. Does exactly what I need it to do and great portable size. Shall be taking on my holiday to back up all the photos I plan to take.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all along?. Love it and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bravocrew

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Used my iPhone for pictures and video on Thursday. Files will not transfer from phone to memory stick. Customer support does not know why other than to say it might be because of using "snap chat". I do not use that app and have never installed it. What DOES work is to set the option to capture pictures and video straight to the stick. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Larkin

product_meta.title: Kingston Bolt USB 3.0 Flash drive Memory Stick for Apple iPhone & iPads with iOS 9.0+, External Expandable Memory Storage, DataTraveler Bolt Duo, Take more photos & videos, 32GB – Silver
product_meta.description:
Style:32GB

Live the moment - Don’t let running out of storage keep you from capturing that perfect moment. The Kingston Bolt features a Lightning connector on one end and a Type A USB on the other end. This allows for the easy transfer or photos and videos from your Apple device.
iPhone and iPad Compatible - The Bolt is an easy way to extend storage space to your iPhone or iPad. Some think of it as an iPhone Flash Drive, iPhone Storage, or iPhone Memory expansion.
Apple MFi Certified - Guaranteed to work with all Apple devices with iOS 9.0+ and Lightning Connector including iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPod touch
Easy to use - Simply plug it in, and download the Bolt app from the App Store**, and then back up your camera roll. The Bolt will make storing your iPhone or iPad photos and videos stress-free. With the Bolt you can take photos and videos directly to the device instead of using your iPhone or iPad storage. The camera feature can record video in 720p, 1080p, or 4K. Pictures are saved directly to the device when plugged in and the app is used. The camera feature of the Bolt app is so similar to the existing iPhone and iPad you won’t feel the need to learn how to use a whole new feature.
Secure – The Kingston Bolt also features an app security feature. This allows a user to set a password or touch ID in order to access the app with their Bolt, protecting against unauthorized use on their iPhone or iPad.
Portable – The Bolt makes extra storage for iPhone or iPad accessible at any time with the included key ring accessory. Many people find that iPhone and iPad storage are difficult to transport. The key ring accessory that is included with the Kingston Bolt can easily be attached to your car keys so it is always with you. 
Sleek Design – The Bolt is a very small form factor unlike many of our competitors. You would be hard pressed to find a similar iPhone Flash or USB storage device that is smaller than the Bolt. The durable metal casing ensures long-lasting performance under tough conditions. There are no clunky caps or cases to deal with.
More Storage – Nothing is more frustrating than trying to take a picture or video on your iPhone or iPad and running out of storage. The Bolt comes in 32GB, 64GB, and 128GB capacity. With the Kingston Bolt you are instantly upgrading your iPhone or iPad Storage capacity and giving you extra room to take more photos and videos with your Apple device. 
Warranty and Support – The Bolt comes with a 2 year warranty and backed by Kingston’s renowned technical support. This gives you peace of mind when using the Bolt with your iPhone or iPad.
Disclaimer – Apple, iPad, iPhone, and Lightning are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries
feature_bullets: Free up iPhone or iPad Storage Space - Automatically back up your Camera roll
Familiar interface - Snap hi-res photos & 720p, 1080p, or 4k videos directly to the Bolt. The Bolt camera looks and interacts just like your iPhone or iPad camera.
Portable – Small form factor and included rubber key ring accessory means it’s easy to take with you and can be used with your iPhone or iPad at any time.
Simple app design - The Bolt is just easy to use, simply plug in and download the app to get started.
Extra Capacity - 32GB/64GB/128GB flash drive for iPhone and iPad. Gives you a storage upgrade without having to upgrade your iPhone or iPad

Apple MFi Certified: Guaranteed to work with all Apple devices with Lightning Connector including iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPod touch
Warranty and Support - The Bolt comes with a 2 year warranty and Free Kingston technical support. This gives you peace of mind when using the Bolt with your iPhone or iPad.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars303 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 4. Bolt app screen, 5. Bolt Packaging, 2. Bolt with accessory on keychain, 1. Bolt by itself, 3. Bolt plugged into iPhone
